group_1.textCenter: Huh? Why am I at school all of the sudden?
I used to go to a school like this...

group_1.textLeft: Ah! It's my reoccurring dream. It's been a@while, so I didn't realize right away.
Tsuruno, you're next. Would you read your@essay now?
Oh wow, this is a blast from the past.

group_1.narration: My grandpa is really, really kind.
Me and my big sis don't get an allowance,@but Grandpa always gives us some money!
On my birthday he takes me to the zoo.@Sometimes he gives me candies too,@but that's a secret.
My mom and grandma are really stingy,@so they never give me anything.
My dad's a good guy, but he always gets@yelled at by my mom and my grandma.@That makes him really sad.
But my grandpa is kind to my dad too.@I love him so much.
He always tells me about how our family@used to be really, really great.
Me and my big sis are going to take@our family to the top, just like he did.
So, that's why,@I want to become the President.@I'll sell noodles at the White House.
I think that'll make Grandpa very happy.

group_1.textRight: Your grandpa heard the report you read.
There's something he wanted me to tell you.
He said it made him really happy, but that@you shouldn't push yourself too hard.
"You need to find your own happiness@and cherish that."
Don't worry about what makes him or the@family happy, he said.

group_1.narration: There really wasn't any need to worry.
What makes me happy hasn't@changed one bit since then!
I'd be so glad to make his dream come true.
Me and my sis, she's studying abroad,@are working to win back the Yui family glory!@That's why I need to succeed!
No need to worry about it, Grandpa.
Since I had this dream, maybe@my sister's reaching out to me...
She's workin' hard towards a lofty@goal overseas, just like me!

group_1.textRight: Tsuruno, you got a letter from your sister.

group_1.textLeft: Ha, I knew it![chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100301:motion_100][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1] Wait, hang on. A letter?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, she could've just done a video chat@like usual. Wonder what's up.
[chara:800900:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]What a peculiar thing to do!@Ah ha ha!

group_1.textLeft: It's probably something so important she@had to write it in a letter!
[chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ah! Maybe she had a huge breakthrough or@something?
